author: Staff Reporter
text:
An elderly woman was robbed of a seven-sovereign gold chain in Poonamalee on Wednesday. Vijayalakshmi (80) was about to board a bus to Kattupakkam when two women started speaking to her. She was distracted and missed the bus and the women promised to drop her in an autorickshaw.

They told Vijayalakshmi to keep her chain safely and helped her pack it.

Upon alighting near her house, Vijayalakshmi checked the bag and found the chain missing. Further investigation is on.
title: Woman robbed
